creator: mannagiri@fnb.co.za
text:
JSP Image Taglib works perfectly on Development machine. But on the 
Integration machine which is a linux box, it fails to render the image.

NEED MORE INFO:
Please check if this is due to the limitations of running the Image application
on a server without the X Server.

Follow this URL for some more details:
http://www.geocities.com/marcoschmidt.geo/java-image-faq.html#x

-
Abey Mullassery
creator: abey@mullassery.com
mannagiri@fnb.co.za
text:
Thanks for the reply.
Will install xvfb and give it a try
